name: Sticker Arena: Roguelike (Demo)
description:
This game belongs to the genre of ACTION ROGUELIKE SURVIVAL. In the game, you will play as 1 of 6 characters. Survive the attack wave of the enemy and choose your projectiles  carefully.

For each character level, you can choose cards that help you increase your strength or projectiles with different abilities. 

There are 14 power-ups, and 23 projectiles with different abilities and rarities from Uncommon to Legendary.

The game has a lot of things to fix, so if you have a problem, please forgive me and send me the problem to improve the game.

Playing my games is the best support for me
